attributes.action: Keep Art History on the curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: "The last exam board in England offering art history A-level will drop the subject from 2018, marking the latest in a cull of perceived “soft” subjects following the curriculum changes begun by the former education secretary Michael Gove." Maev Kennedy - The Guardian
attributes.background:
AQA will be the final exam board to cut Art History out of the curriculum from 2018. Art History education is invaluable in terms of cultural education and MUST continue to be taught in state schools. 

http://www.arthistoryinschools.org.uk/
